group_contents.title: Sustainable Garden
group_contents.desc:
The garden can be found adjacent to the Roger Stevens Building and is a collaborative project between the Facilities Directorate, Leeds University Union and academic staff.

Regular gardening sessions that are open to all are hosted by Caroline Scott from Leeds University Union every Thursday from 12-2pm. The food itself is intended to be picked; instructions of what can be picked, and how to pick, are signposted throughout the garden.

If you are interested in getting involved with the planting (experience not essential), conducting research or would like to know more, please email: sustainability@leeds.ac.uk or bardongrangeproject@luu.leeds.ac.uk. To open a map of the garden, click here
